Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.client.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Client
extends Object
implements Runnable
Represents the client. Allows the creation of a socket connection and the received messages sorting.

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client​(RequestManager requestManager, String address, int socketPort)
      Assigns Client class necessary parameters.
      Parameters:
      requestManager - Request Manager (CLI or GUI) used to handle messages.
      address - Server IP address.
      socketPort - Socket port.

  • Method Details

    • startConnection

      public boolean startConnection()
      Attempts the creation of a socket connection, given the constructor parameters in Client(it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.client.RequestManager,java.lang.String,int). If the socket has been opened correctly, InputStream and OutputStream are created and assigned, a new ClientGameHandler is created and started.
      Returns:
      true if connection has been started successfully, false otherwise.

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs an input object reader. This method (and therefore the thread) must be used only if the connection has been started beforehand using startConnection(). This method sorts the messages depending on their scope (actual play messages, heartbeats...), adding them to a managing queue (in ClientGameHandler if needed.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
